backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend canister with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including market sentiment analysis, trend prediction, automatic TP/SL adjustment suggestions, and position size calculator with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and services for the AI-powered crypto trading assistant application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH-based golden color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including primary, secondary, accent, and UI component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest links, meta tags for mobile web app capabilities, theme colors, and Apple touch icons for progressive web app installation.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, display mode, theme colors, shortcuts, and categories for installable crypto position monitor application.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, network-first for API calls, offline fallback support, and cache management for PWA functionality.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with header, navigation, collapsible sections for position entry form, position size calculator, portfolio exposure dashboard, scenario simulator, and position monitoring dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AdjustmentSugges: Component displaying TP/SL adjustment suggestions with current vs. proposed levels, confidence badges, reasoning text, and accept/dismiss action buttons.
frontend/src/components/ExposureChart.ts: Displays portfolio exposure metrics with two cards: Asset Allocation showing capital deployed per symbol with progress bars, and Long/Short Balance showing position counts and capital distribution with visual indicators.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: PWA install button component that conditionally renders based on installability status and triggers the install prompt when clicked.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioExposur: Main dashboard displaying portfolio exposure metrics including capital deployed, leverage exposure, potential P&L, warning flags for high exposure/correlation/imbalance, and correlation risks with visual charts.
frontend/src/components/PositionCard.tsx: Card component for individual trading positions showing P&L, distance to TP/SL, sentiment gauge, trend predictions, AI adjustment suggestions with accept/dismiss actions, and delete functionality with visual indicators for near-target states.
frontend/src/components/PositionDashboar: Container component that displays all active positions using PositionCard components, handles real-time price monitoring, shows empty state when no positions exist, and provides add/update/delete position actions.
frontend/src/components/PositionEntryFor: Form component for creating new trading positions with inputs for symbol selection (searchable Binance pairs), position type (long/short), leverage slider, entry price, and investment amount; automatically calculates TP/SL levels using historical data and technical analysis.
frontend/src/components/PositionSizeCalc: React component that calculates optimal position size based on capital, risk percentage, entry/stop-loss prices, and leverage. Includes a slider UI for risk adjustment and an apply button to pass results to parent components.
frontend/src/components/ScenarioSimulato: React component that simulates portfolio outcomes under different price change scenarios using preset buttons and a custom slider. Displays total impact, liquidation risks, and per-position outcomes.
frontend/src/components/SentimentGauge.t: React component that fetches and displays market sentiment analysis for a symbol, showing bullish/bearish score, strength percentage, and contributing factors with visual indicators.
frontend/src/components/StopLossRecommen: React component that displays stop-loss recommendations including price, distance from current price, max loss, capital risk percentage, reasoning, and partial taking strategy with visual alerts for near-SL conditions.
frontend/src/components/TakeProfitRecomm: React component that renders multiple take-profit levels with target prices, profit calculations, distance from current price, and reasoning. Highlights reached targets and shows visual indicators for long/short positions.
frontend/src/components/TrendPredictionC: React component that fetches and displays AI-powered trend predictions for a symbol, showing short-term and medium-term directional forecasts with confidence levels and visual direction indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages Internet Identity authentication and creates backend actors with proper identity configuration, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdjustmentSuggesti: Fetches Binance price data and generates adjustment suggestions for position take-profit and stop-loss levels, refreshing every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinancePairs.ts: Queries and caches the list of perpetual trading pairs from Binance with a 1-hour stale time.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity persistence, and status tracking for the entire application.
Calculates and memoizes portfolio exposure metrics including capital deployment, leverage, and correlation risks from position data.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositionMonitoring: Monitors positions by fetching current prices from Binance every 5 seconds and calculating real-time PnL and distances to take-profit/stop-loss levels.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositionStorage.ts: Manages position data persistence in localStorage with CRUD operations for adding, updating, and deleting positions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Manages Progressive Web App installation prompts and tracks installation state using the beforeinstallprompt event.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating backend operations are handled through direct Binance API calls rather than the backend canister.
Fetches 1-hour kline data from Binance and analyzes market sentiment based on price and volume patterns, refreshing every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrendPrediction.ts: Predicts short-term and medium-term price trends using hourly and daily kline data from Binance, refreshing every 5 minutes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with a golden-themed color palette for light/dark modes, including custom utilities for animations and PWA styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/services/binanceApi.ts: Provides API functions to fetch perpetual trading pairs, current prices, and kline data from Binance Futures endpoints.
frontend/src/types/adjustment.ts: Defines types for position adjustment suggestions including take-profit/stop-loss recommendations with confidence scores and action history.
frontend/src/types/calculator.ts: Defines types for position size calculator inputs and results including capital, risk percentage, and risk-reward calculations.
frontend/src/types/exposure.ts: Defines types for portfolio exposure analysis including asset allocation, long/short balance, correlation risks, and warning flags.
frontend/src/types/position.ts: Defines core position types including entry details, take-profit levels, stop-loss recommendations, and real-time price/PnL data.
frontend/src/types/prediction.ts: Defines types for trend predictions including direction (up/down/sideways), confidence, time horizon, and prediction history with actual outcomes.
frontend/src/types/scenario.ts: Defines types for scenario analysis including inputs, position outcomes with simulated prices and P&L, and preset scenarios for portfolio stress testing.
frontend/src/types/sentiment.ts: Defines types for market sentiment analysis including sentiment scores (bullish/bearish/neutral), strength metrics, and contributing factors with their impacts.
frontend/src/utils/adjustmentSuggestions: Generates position adjustment suggestions based on market conditions (volatility, ATR, support/resistance) by analyzing price data and recommending stop-loss or take-profit modifications.
Calculates portfolio-wide exposure metrics including capital deployed, leverage exposure, long/short balance, asset distribution, and correlation risks between positions.
frontend/src/utils/pnlCalculations.ts: Provides utility functions to calculate profit/loss in USD and percentage for long/short positions based on entry price, current price, investment amount, and leverage.
frontend/src/utils/positionSizeCalculato: Calculates optimal position size based on capital, risk percentage, stop-loss distance, and leverage, returning position size, contracts, risk/reward amounts and ratio.
frontend/src/utils/registerServiceWorker: Registers and manages the service worker for PWA functionality, handles updates, and checks for new versions hourly with optional user notification.
frontend/src/utils/scenarioSimulator.ts: Simulates portfolio performance under various market scenarios (crash, rally, volatility) by calculating projected P&L, checking TP/SL hits, and assessing liquidation risks.
frontend/src/utils/sentimentAnalysis.ts: Analyzes market sentiment using technical indicators (RSI, MACD, volume trends, price action, momentum) and generates bullish/bearish/neutral sentiment scores with contributing factors.
frontend/src/utils/stopLossCalculator.ts: Calculates recommended stop-loss levels using ATR, support/resistance levels, and leverage-adjusted risk parameters, providing loss estimates and partial profit-taking strategies.
Calculates three take-profit levels (TP1, TP2, TP3) for trading positions using technical analysis including support/resistance levels, volatility, and leverage adjustments, with reasoning for each target price.
frontend/src/utils/technicalAnalysis.ts: Provides technical analysis utilities including ATR calculation, volatility measurement, support/resistance level detection through price clustering, and risk-reward ratio computation.
frontend/src/utils/trendPrediction.ts: Predicts short-term (1-24 hours) and medium-term (1-7 days) price trends using moving averages, momentum, and volatility indicators, returning direction and confidence scores.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended animations, border radius variables, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a crypto trading monitoring app with manual position entry, AI-powered TP/SL recommendations, real-time Binance API integration, technical analysis algorithms, and PWA capabilities.
